title.@value: Car as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event

definition.@value: A land transport motor vehicle designed primarily to seat no more than 9 persons, including the driver, designed primarily for on-road use or so as to be registrable for on-road use. A trailer or caravan being towed by a car is considered a part of the car. Usually has four wheels.

label.@value: Car as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event
Passenger car as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event
